mapper.select: select * from km_doc where file_id=#{fileId} limit 0,1
select kd.* from km_doc kd join km_doc_topic_type kdtt on kd.id = kdtt.doc_id join sys_category sc on sc.id = kdtt.topic_id where sc.id = #{topicId}

SELECT sd.item_text,COUNT(0) AS amount, CASE
WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024*1024*1024 THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(SUM(file_size)/(1024*1024*1024) , DECIMAL(5,0)),' G') WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024*1024 THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(SUM(file_size)/(1024*1024) , DECIMAL(5,0)),' M') WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024 THEN CONCAT(CONVERT(SUM(file_size)/1024 , DECIMAL(5,0)),' K') ELSE CONCAT(CONVERT(SUM(file_size) , DECIMAL(5,0)),' B')
WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024*1024*1024 THEN CONCAT(CAST(SUM(file_size)/(1024*1024*1024) as DECIMAL(5,0)),' G') WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024*1024 THEN CONCAT(CAST(SUM(file_size)/(1024*1024) as DECIMAL(5,0)),' M') WHEN SUM(file_size) >1024 THEN CONCAT(CAST(SUM(file_size)/1024 as DECIMAL(5,0)),' K') ELSE CONCAT(CAST(SUM(file_size) as DECIMAL(5,0)),' B')
END AS fileSize FROM km_doc kd
JOIN (SELECT sdi.item_text,sdi.item_value FROM sys_dict_item sdi JOIN sys_dict sd ON sdi.dict_id=sd.id WHERE sd.dict_code='km_dict_category') sd ON kd.category=sd.item_value
JOIN (SELECT sdi.item_text,sdi.item_value FROM sys_dict_item sdi JOIN sys_dict sd ON sdi.dict_id=sd.id WHERE sd.dict_code='km_dict_source') sd ON kd.source=sd.item_value
JOIN (SELECT sdi.item_text,sdi.item_value FROM sys_dict_item sdi JOIN sys_dict sd ON sdi.dict_id=sd.id WHERE sd.dict_code='doc_dict_status') sd ON
kd.status=sd.item_value
to_char(kd.status)=sd.item_value
JOIN km_doc_business_type kdbt ON kdbt.doc_id=kd.id JOIN (SELECT sdi.item_text,sdi.item_value FROM sys_dict_item sdi JOIN sys_dict sd ON sdi.dict_id=sd.id WHERE sd.dict_code='km_dict_business') sd ON kdbt.business_type=sd.item_value
JOIN km_doc_version kdv ON kdv.doc_id=kd.id JOIN (SELECT sdi.item_text,sdi.item_value FROM sys_dict_item sdi JOIN sys_dict sd ON sdi.dict_id=sd.id WHERE sd.dict_code='km_dict_versions') sd ON kdv.version=sd.item_value
JOIN km_doc_topic_type kdtt ON kdtt.doc_id=kd.id JOIN (SELECT id, sc.name AS item_text,sc.code AS item_value FROM sys_category sc WHERE pid=0) sd ON kdtt.topic_id = sd.id
GROUP BY sd.item_text ORDER BY amount DESC
